name: PANDEMECH - No Fun Allowed
description:
How would a world in which the virus is still present look like? Among all the sanitation measures and malfunctioning robots, you are a student desperate to save their locked up director from the evil robot teachers. Craft weapons in order to pass each level and find out why the robots are malfunctioning! The fate of the school is in your hands. 

Get a taste of what the game will look like in this unfinished prototype created by 4 students of the BTS Game Programming-, Art- and Game Design.

Important Tips

Since the game is still an unfinished prototype, there are a few features missing. Most notably being able to use the weapons your craft. Furthermore, make sure that you craft the weapon of the previous level before advancing to the next as you need the previous version to upgrade to the next. We're sorry for causing any inconvenience and hope that you still have an enjoyable time testing our first game. :)
